question: Angad Vir Singh Bajwa is associated to which sports?
explanation: In shooting, Angad Vir Singh Bajwa unofficially hit a world record score in the men\'s skeet final at the 63rd National Shooting Championships for Shotgun events in New Delhi on 29th November 2019. He defeated his senior and fellow Tokyo 2020 quota winner Mairaj Ahmad Khan of Uttar Pradesh. He also equalled a record he jointly holds with skeet legend Vincent Hancock and two others.
